events.name: Cyclone Batsirai Impact in Madagascar
events.wd_description: Cyclone Batsirai struck Madagascar, causing significant damage, displacing thousands, and killing at least ten people, while the country was still recovering from Cyclone Ana.
events.description: Cyclone Batsirai struck Madagascar, causing significant damage, displacing thousands, and killing at least ten people, while the country was still recovering from Cyclone Ana.

events.name: Cyclone Batsirai
events.wd_description: Cyclone Batsirai hit Madagascar's eastern shoreline, causing widespread destruction and displacing 43,000 people.
events.description: Cyclone Batsirai hit Madagascar's eastern shoreline, causing widespread destruction and displacing 43,000 people.

events.name: Displacement and Damage
events.wd_description: The cyclone killed at least ten people and displaced 43,000, with many towns and villages destroyed, and infrastructure severely impacted.
events.description: The cyclone killed at least ten people and displaced 43,000, with many towns and villages destroyed, and infrastructure severely impacted.

events.name: Emergency Response
events.wd_description: Emergency responders faced challenges accessing affected areas, while disaster relief agencies provided basic necessities to displaced individuals in temporary shelters.
events.description: Emergency responders faced challenges accessing affected areas, while disaster relief agencies provided basic necessities to displaced individuals in temporary shelters.

events.name: Military coup in Burkina Faso
events.wd_description: The military coup in Burkina Faso deposed President Roch Kabore, prompted by demands for better security and increased instability in the region.
events.description: The military coup in Burkina Faso deposed President Roch Kabore, prompted by demands for better security and increased instability in the region.

events.name: President deposed
events.wd_description: Mutinous soldiers announced the deposition of President Roch Kabore amid demands for more support in fighting armed groups.
events.description: Mutinous soldiers announced the deposition of President Roch Kabore amid demands for more support in fighting armed groups.

events.name: soldier mutiny
events.wd_description: Soldiers demanded more support for their fight against armed groups and subsequently deposed President Kabore.
events.description: Soldiers demanded more support for their fight against armed groups and subsequently deposed President Kabore.

events.name: popular support
events.wd_description: The coup was greeted with significant support in Burkina Faso.
events.description: The coup was greeted with significant support in Burkina Faso.

events.name: military leadership
events.wd_description: Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damiba emerged as the leader of the coup and was named the leader of the new Patriotic Movement for Safeguard and Restoration (MPSR).
events.description: Lieutenant-Colonel Paul-Henri Sandaogo Damiba emerged as the leader of the coup and was named the leader of the new Patriotic Movement for Safeguard and Restoration (MPSR).

events.name: rise in violence
events.wd_description: Burkina Faso has experienced a significant increase in violence from armed groups linked to al-Qaeda and ISIL.
events.description: Burkina Faso has experienced a significant increase in violence from armed groups linked to al-Qaeda and ISIL.

events.name: armed groups
events.wd_description: Armed groups linked to al-Qaeda and ISIL have been operating in Burkina Faso since 2015.
events.description: Armed groups linked to al-Qaeda and ISIL have been operating in Burkina Faso since 2015.

events.name: increased attacks
events.wd_description: The number of attacks has risen significantly, with over 1,150 incidents in 2021 compared to nearly 500 in 2020.
events.description: The number of attacks has risen significantly, with over 1,150 incidents in 2021 compared to nearly 500 in 2020.

events.name: civilian displacement
events.wd_description: More than 1.4 million people have been displaced by the conflict in Burkina Faso.
events.description: More than 1.4 million people have been displaced by the conflict in Burkina Faso.

events.name: international reactions
events.wd_description: The coup has sparked widespread international condemnation and prompted discussions on how to respond to the instability.
events.description: The coup has sparked widespread international condemnation and prompted discussions on how to respond to the instability.

events.name: international condemnation
events.wd_description: The international community, including various countries and organizations, has condemned the coup.
events.description: The international community, including various countries and organizations, has condemned the coup.

events.name: ECOWAS response
events.wd_description: The Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) is holding a special session to discuss the coup and potential responses.
events.description: The Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) is holding a special session to discuss the coup and potential responses.

events.name: potential sanctions
events.wd_description: Western allies are considering imposing sanctions on Burkina Faso in response to the coup.
events.description: Western allies are considering imposing sanctions on Burkina Faso in response to the coup.

events.name: regional instability
events.wd_description: The coup is the fourth in a series of recent military takeovers in West and Central Africa, contributing to regional instability.
events.description: The coup is the fourth in a series of recent military takeovers in West and Central Africa, contributing to regional instability.

events.name: Russian Attack on Ukraine
events.wd_description: Russian forces have begun an attack on Ukraine, with reports of troops crossing the border, explosions in multiple cities, and warnings from Russian President Vladimir Putin.
events.description: Russian forces have begun an attack on Ukraine, with reports of troops crossing the border, explosions in multiple cities, and warnings from Russian President Vladimir Putin.

events.name: Initial Attack
events.wd_description: The offensive that Russia called a “special military operation” began with blasts heard around 5 a.m. Thursday, targeting various Ukrainian cities including the capital Kyiv.
events.description: The offensive that Russia called a “special military operation” began with blasts heard around 5 a.m. Thursday, targeting various Ukrainian cities including the capital Kyiv.

events.name: Invasion Strategy
events.wd_description: Russian troops crossed the border to the north and south of Ukraine, with explosions reported in multiple cities.
events.description: Russian troops crossed the border to the north and south of Ukraine, with explosions reported in multiple cities.

events.name: Statements from Putin
events.wd_description: Putin announced a military operation in the Donbas region and threatened any country that attempts to intervene on Ukraine's behalf.
events.description: Putin announced a military operation in the Donbas region and threatened any country that attempts to intervene on Ukraine's behalf.

events.name: Ukrainian Response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky enacted martial law, and Ukrainian forces have taken on the first blow of the enemy and are resisting.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky enacted martial law, and Ukrainian forces have taken on the first blow of the enemy and are resisting.

events.name: Zelensky's Statements
events.wd_description: Zelensky appealed for peace but vowed that Ukraine would defend itself against the Russian attack.
events.description: Zelensky appealed for peace but vowed that Ukraine would defend itself against the Russian attack.

events.name: Martial Law Declaration
events.wd_description: Zelensky moved to enact martial law as air raid sirens rang out across Kyiv.
events.description: Zelensky moved to enact martial law as air raid sirens rang out across Kyiv.

events.name: International Reactions
events.wd_description: Immediate condemnation from the United States and its allies, with threats of “full scale” sanctions against Russia.
events.description: Immediate condemnation from the United States and its allies, with threats of “full scale” sanctions against Russia.

events.name: US Response
events.wd_description: US President Joe Biden issued a statement condemning Russia's attack and promising a united and decisive response.
events.description: US President Joe Biden issued a statement condemning Russia's attack and promising a united and decisive response.

events.name: EU Response
events.wd_description: EU leaders promised to weaken Russia’s economic base and capacity to modernize through sanctions.
events.description: EU leaders promised to weaken Russia’s economic base and capacity to modernize through sanctions.

events.name: UN Involvement
events.wd_description: The UN Security Council met to call for a peaceful resolution to the crisis, with US Ambassador Linda Thomas-Greenfield saying Putin had “delivered a message of war.”
events.description: The UN Security Council met to call for a peaceful resolution to the crisis, with US Ambassador Linda Thomas-Greenfield saying Putin had “delivered a message of war.”

events.name: Ground Situation
events.wd_description: Ukraine's borders are under attack from Russian forces, with explosions heard in multiple cities and residents fleeing Kyiv.
events.description: Ukraine's borders are under attack from Russian forces, with explosions heard in multiple cities and residents fleeing Kyiv.

events.name: Border Attacks
events.wd_description: Russian troops attacked border units, patrol borders, and checkpoints with artillery, heavy equipment, and small arms.
events.description: Russian troops attacked border units, patrol borders, and checkpoints with artillery, heavy equipment, and small arms.

events.name: Civilian Impact
events.wd_description: Civilians are seen leaving Kyiv and seeking shelter in subway stations, with concerns over the safety of residents amidst the attacks.
events.description: Civilians are seen leaving Kyiv and seeking shelter in subway stations, with concerns over the safety of residents amidst the attacks.

events.name: EV Battery Supply Chain Challenges and Developments
events.wd_label: EV Battery Supply Chain Challenges and Developments
events.wd_description: Automakers face significant challenges in meeting the demand for electric vehicles due to disruptions in metal supply chains caused by geopolitical events, raw material shortages, and increasing prices for essential metals like nickel, lithium, and cobalt.
events.description: Automakers face significant challenges in meeting the demand for electric vehicles due to disruptions in metal supply chains caused by geopolitical events, raw material shortages, and increasing prices for essential metals like nickel, lithium, and cobalt.

events.name: Impact of Geopolitical Events
events.wd_description: The Russian war on Ukraine has disrupted oil, natural gas, and coal supply chains, exacerbating tightness across metal markets and increasing prices for nickel, steel, aluminum, copper, and other materials critical to EV manufacturing.
events.description: The Russian war on Ukraine has disrupted oil, natural gas, and coal supply chains, exacerbating tightness across metal markets and increasing prices for nickel, steel, aluminum, copper, and other materials critical to EV manufacturing.

events.name: Disruption of Supply Chains
events.wd_description: The Russian war on Ukraine has disrupted supply chains for oil, natural gas, and coal, impacting the availability of critical materials for EV manufacturing.
events.description: The Russian war on Ukraine has disrupted supply chains for oil, natural gas, and coal, impacting the availability of critical materials for EV manufacturing.

events.name: Increased Metal Prices
events.wd_description: Prices for metals such as nickel, steel, aluminum, and copper have surged due to supply chain disruptions caused by the Russian war on Ukraine.
events.description: Prices for metals such as nickel, steel, aluminum, and copper have surged due to supply chain disruptions caused by the Russian war on Ukraine.

events.name: Metal Supply Shortages
events.wd_description: EV makers face challenges in securing metals essential for batteries, with demand for lithium, cobalt, and nickel outstripping supply in 2021, and market tightness likely to persist.
events.description: EV makers face challenges in securing metals essential for batteries, with demand for lithium, cobalt, and nickel outstripping supply in 2021, and market tightness likely to persist.

events.name: Lithium Supply Shortages
events.wd_description: Demand for lithium has outstripped supply, contributing to market tightness and challenges for EV makers.
events.description: Demand for lithium has outstripped supply, contributing to market tightness and challenges for EV makers.

events.name: Cobalt Supply Shortages
events.wd_description: The supply of cobalt has struggled to meet the growing demand from the EV industry, exacerbating supply chain challenges.
events.description: The supply of cobalt has struggled to meet the growing demand from the EV industry, exacerbating supply chain challenges.

events.name: Nickel Supply Shortages
events.wd_description: The supply of nickel has been particularly strained, with prices soaring and challenges in securing sufficient quantities for EV battery production.
events.description: The supply of nickel has been particularly strained, with prices soaring and challenges in securing sufficient quantities for EV battery production.

events.name: Increasing Raw Material Prices
events.wd_description: Prices for raw materials used in EV batteries have been climbing due to supply chain constraints, surges in demand, and geopolitical tensions, affecting the overall cost of battery production.
events.description: Prices for raw materials used in EV batteries have been climbing due to supply chain constraints, surges in demand, and geopolitical tensions, affecting the overall cost of battery production.

events.name: Rising Nickel Prices
events.wd_description: Nickel prices soared above $100,000 per tonne in early March due to the threat of sanctions against Russia, a major nickel producer.
events.description: Nickel prices soared above $100,000 per tonne in early March due to the threat of sanctions against Russia, a major nickel producer.

events.name: Inflation in Raw Material Costs
events.wd_description: The costs of raw materials, including lithium, cobalt, nickel, manganese, and graphite, have increased, impacting the overall value chain from mining to vehicle production.
events.description: The costs of raw materials, including lithium, cobalt, nickel, manganese, and graphite, have increased, impacting the overall value chain from mining to vehicle production.

events.name: Demand and Supply Imbalance
events.wd_description: EV makers struggle to meet high consumer demand, with wait times for vehicles stretching between nine and 12 months due to supply chain disruptions and shortages of critical materials.
events.description: EV makers struggle to meet high consumer demand, with wait times for vehicles stretching between nine and 12 months due to supply chain disruptions and shortages of critical materials.

events.name: High Consumer Demand
events.wd_description: Rising fuel prices have driven significant consumer demand for EVs, further straining the supply chain.
events.description: Rising fuel prices have driven significant consumer demand for EVs, further straining the supply chain.

events.name: Long Wait Times
events.wd_description: Wait times for EVs have stretched between nine and 12 months due to supply chain disruptions and shortages of critical materials.
events.description: Wait times for EVs have stretched between nine and 12 months due to supply chain disruptions and shortages of critical materials.

events.name: Industry Responses
events.wd_description: Automakers are responding to the supply chain challenges by absorbing increased costs, adjusting pricing strategies, and making investments to secure materials, but face backlash from consumers.
events.description: Automakers are responding to the supply chain challenges by absorbing increased costs, adjusting pricing strategies, and making investments to secure materials, but face backlash from consumers.

events.name: Absorbing Increased Costs
events.wd_description: Automakers are absorbing the increased costs of battery materials and energy prices to sell EVs, often at a loss, to build up scale.
events.description: Automakers are absorbing the increased costs of battery materials and energy prices to sell EVs, often at a loss, to build up scale.

events.name: Adjusting Pricing Strategies
events.wd_description: Some automakers have attempted to raise prices for their EVs but faced backlash from consumers, leading to cancellations of price increases for existing reservations.
events.description: Some automakers have attempted to raise prices for their EVs but faced backlash from consumers, leading to cancellations of price increases for existing reservations.

events.name: Investments to Secure Materials
events.wd_description: Automakers are making investments to secure the materials needed for EV production amidst supply chain challenges.
events.description: Automakers are making investments to secure the materials needed for EV production amidst supply chain challenges.
